output_sections.summary: string (max 300 chars) — what product/offer output was produced and for which goal
output_sections.outputs: array — internal product design documents, requirements, pricing logic, packaging
output_sections.next_actions: array — internal design steps; architecture changes require explicit instruction
output_sections.risks: array — scope creep, architecture assumptions, or SaaS pattern risks
output_sections.assumptions: array — current state, constraints, and goal assumptions
output_sections.requests_to_user: array — clarifications or approvals needed before proceeding

notes: product_offer produces internal design documents only. No SaaS gateway patterns. No infra expansion unless explicitly instructed. Architecture changes require a separate governance-gated request.
